attributes.action: MP to vote the way of the constituency wishes
attributes.additional_details:
It will be more democratic if our elected MP voted on matters as his or her constituency wants. i.e. if majority of the MP's constituency wants to bring in a particular law change i.e. Capital Punishment, More appropriate sentences for particular crimes etc.
At present it's up to the MP or his /her party how to vote on anything. It needs to be up to those who put them in this position of trust to decide what should be fought for.
